	- in minutes
* crontab
	- crontab -e
		* format: f1 f2 f3 f4 f5 program
f1: minutes
f2: hours
f3: day
f4: month
f5: weekday
program: excutable
examples:
	0 */2 * * * echo "xxx" >> /tmp/a.txt # every 2 hours
	0 23-7/28 * * * # every 11 in everning to 8 in money every 2 hours. Wrong??
	* * * * 1-3	# Monday to Wensday
	- service crond restart
	- crontab -l
